==========================================================================
==                            API CHANGE LOG                            ==
==========================================================================
                             Carts and items
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
--                              What's New                              --
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
- POST   /carts/{customerId}/items
- DELETE /carts/{customerId}/items/{itemId}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
--                            What's Deleted                            --
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
- GET    /catalogue
- GET    /catalogue/{id}
- GET    /catalogue/size
- GET    /tags

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
--                                Result                                --
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 API changes broke backward compatibility
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
